name: Explore The Famous Destinations In Da Lat - stay with local people ( free homestay )
description: Did you ever travel and try stay with local people.? Learning the culture, enjoy some local foods, street foods in the evening.?Did you ever try explore  by motobike.? Follow me, i will show you all the destinations by Motobike:Today, in the morning we will visit : Prenn Waterfall→ Chicken Village→ Pongour Waterfall→ Elephant Waterfall→ Silkworm→ Weasels Coffee ( coffee farm )→ Flowers Village.In the evening, i will show you around XuanHuong lake, visit night market, enjoy some tea, coffee and street foods, local foods....  A picture is'nt worth than you come and explore Dalat.Hope you will join with us..:)
